sentences.en: He therefore showed little interest in the gestures of active solidarity from Madrid.
sentences.cn: 因此,他对于马德里的这副积极拉拢的姿态并不怎么感兴趣.

sentences.en: He voiced his solidarity with the weak and defenceless.
sentences.cn: 他表示自己同弱势和无助群体站在一起。

sentences.en: I could not explain how much I valued my code of solidarity.
sentences.cn: 我解释不了我是多么看重团伙的规矩的.

sentences.en: It was the middle - class female solidarity.
sentences.cn: 这是这位中产阶级妇女的团结思想.

sentences.en: Solidarity means strength; solidarity means victory.
sentences.cn: 团结就是力量, 团结就是胜利.

sentences.en: Special emphasis was laid on the importance of Afro - Asian solidarity.
sentences.cn: 大家特别强调了亚非团结的重要性.

sentences.en: Spirit of Yidelong: Solidarity, struggling, practicality, innovation and ceaseless self - improvement .
sentences.cn: 益德隆的精神: 团结, 拼博, 求实, 创新, 自强不息.

sentences.en: Such a vision of the solidarity of life had never before come to Lily.
sentences.cn: 这种人与人之间休戚相关的关系是丽莉以前从未体验过的.

sentences.en: The bitter split which has developed within Solidarity is likely to harden further into separation.
sentences.cn: 团结工会内部已产生的不愉快分歧可能会进一步演变为分裂。

sentences.en: The moral of the story is that'solidarity is strength '.
sentences.cn: 这个故事的教益在于'团结就是力量 '.

sentences.en: The Pope has sent a message appealing for unity in his homeland, against a background of divisions in the Solidarity movement.
sentences.cn: 团结运动中各派搞分裂，在此情况下教皇发出号召，呼吁祖国保持团结。

sentences.en: The solidarity among China's various nationalities is as firm as a rock.
sentences.cn: 中国各族人民之间的团结坚如磐石.

sentences.en: The voters may be ready to punish the politicians who devised a faint-hearted solidarity pact.
sentences.cn: 选民们也许已经作好准备，去惩罚那些制订了懦弱的团结协定的政客。
他们必须维护他们的团结.

sentences.en: Your union is based on solidarity forever.
sentences.cn: 你们的工会是建立在永远互相支援的基础上的.
